name: Latig0sx
body:
### Usage

**1) OS X Security Compliance**

    $ sudo ./latig0sx -c -u <user>

**2) OS X Hardening**

    $ sudo ./latig0sx -h -u <user>


### Features

    **OS X Security Compliance**
    System Hardware
    Global System Settings
    System Preferences
    Accounts
    Services
    DEP & ASLR Protection
    Encryption

    **OS X Hardening**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
